author: elecharny
msg: o Modified the Move operationContext to store the OriginalEntry and the ModifiedEntry (we are not anymore using the ClonedServerEntry)
o The entry operational attributes are now updated before calling the backend, in order to make the move operation atomic
o Removed a useless lookup in referralInterceptor

msg: Code mods to support streaming attachment replication.

msg: Add method for converting a Flow directly to an object array

author: elecharny
msg: Split a test in two parts because the revert operation does not correctly handle referrals
